*Blizzard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sinesis picki=
ng his parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *Blizzard says to Sinesis*=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

  Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Dee=
mos helps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but to no =
avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base.

  "My wife, y=
ou see she in hurt, and I need to use your CR Chambers, I have been told th=
at this is the base of the mighty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell Beas=
t? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell Beast'=
s base.

  Sinesis slowly crawled along, pushing Sinister's parts. Sinesis =
stopped every mile to catch his breath, his jets her wrecked. He kept going=
 and going and going.

  Plintissa seen a letter from Dracona, saying she h=
ad retruned to base. Plintissa shrugged and walked along her way. Artist tr=
ipped her up and walked on ahead. Plintissa felt like crying again, this is=
 the one she loved? Artist laughed and went on his way.

  Dracona picked u=
p the device, but suddenly, the device exploded, sending a fireball into th=
e Predacon base. (Megatron's base) Dracona gasped. She had better be going =
now. She slowly started to sneak away.

  The Radicons hurried on their way=
, maybe some other team would apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Ai=
rbomber just hoped that Infectra would come with them.

  Lightmare's spark=
 joined the Matrix, she is DEAD.

  Gangon's spark hovered in front of Brig=
htBlade, swirling around her over and over again.
